title: Travel manager

education.name: Moscow state University of service
education.faculty, speciality: social and cultural services and tourism, Hotel business and tourism

experience.description:
* Development of individual routes on request (private and corporate trips)
* Reservatons of air and railway tickets, transfers, hotels, conference halls, catering, etc.
* Providing visa support for foreigners
* Calculations of estimates, invoicing, control of payment for services.
* Signing contracts with foreign partners and hotels,
* Market analysis and formation of special offers.
* Participation in tenders, foreign exhibitions, accompanying groups on trips.

* Development of incentive trips and corporate events depending on the customer's wishes.
• Monitoring the occupancy and the payment of guaranteed blocks of rooms in hotels.
* Calculation of tours for individual clients, booking of hotels and services.
* Organizing and conducting business trips

* Development and management of events in MICE services for corporate clients .
* Full-cycle project management - preparation of event calculations, negotiations with partners both abroad and in Russia, correspondence with foreign partners, participation in tenders, booking services, preparation of related documentation, preparation of documents for visas; if necessary, support at events.

skills:
Travel support:
Realization of MICE events from 15 to 280 persons.
Support in advertising and informational trips.

Programs:
Master Tour, Microsoft office, Power Point , Canva, Excel, Hotelbeds, Hotelspro,  Ostrovok, etc.

Personal skills:
Communication, responsibility, purposefulness, diligence, attentiveness.

dop_info.dop 2: Desired travel time to work: Up to one hour
